refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: mysql_list_processes returns a result pointer describing the current server threads.

example.title: mysql_list_processes example
example.programlisting:
<?php
$link = mysql_connect('localhost', 'mysql_user', 'mysql_password');

$result = mysql_list_processes($link);
while ($row = mysql_fetch_assoc($result)){
    printf("%s %s %s %s %s\n", $row["Id"], $row["Host"], $row["db"],
       $row["Command"], $row["Time"]);
}
mysql_free_result($result);
?>
example.para: The above example would produce the following output:
example.screen: 1 localhost test Processlist 0 4 localhost mysql sleep 5
